gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Wizards 112, Hornets 100
gameRecap.excerpt: Kyle Kuzma led the Wizards with 28 points (14 in Q4), eight rebounds, and nine assists as the Wizards defeated the Hornets, 112-100 after outscoring them 44-24 in Q4. Deni Avdija added 18 points and 14 rebounds as Jordan Poole totaled 15 points, five rebounds, and seven assists for Washington. Miles Bridges led Charlotte with 32 points and 12 rebounds while Brandon Miller added 21 points and six rebounds.
